properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where ((RegistryValueData in~ ("DWORD (0x00000001)", "DWORD (0x00000002)")) and RegistryKey endswith "\\Microsoft\\Internet Explorer\\Main\\DisableFirstRunCustomize") and (not((InitiatingProcessFolderPath in~ ("C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe", "C:\\Windows\\System32\\ie4uinit.exe"))))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects changes to the Internet Explorer "DisableFirstRunCustomize" value, which prevents Internet Explorer from running the first run wizard the first time a user starts the browser after installing Internet Explorer or Windows.
